scripts.test: npm run prereport && npx cypress run
scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress:e2e: npm run test; npm run mockawesome:merge
scripts.cypress:chrome:headless: npm run test --headless --browser chrome; npm run mochawesome:merge
